          <title>
            <string language="en">Keeping the house warm via thermal insulators</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Haus warm halten über thermische

            <string language="x-mt-fr">Maintenant la maison chaude par l'intermédiaire

termales</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows ways of keeping the house warm by using thermal insulators.</string>
